reward: Party leader gets to pick any available PVP game this week.
punishment: Party leader deletes 1 HCMC probability and 2 weekday “FUN” events. Start up HCMC again unless PVP has been removed.
description: The CyberBadger Cete has ambushed you! Defend your party from the CyberBadger Cete and claim your reward!

reward: Party leader gets to pick any available PVP game for the week. Party also gains 50 ducats
punishment: {AGRESSER} Add 10 mins to daily 30 min work out for the rest of the week. Spinner Deletes 2 spin options and 2 weekday “FUN” events (can not be PvP). No PvP game will be picked this week.
description: STRENGTH

reward: Party leader gets to pick any available PVP game for the week. Party also gains 50 ducats
punishment: {CONFUSION} All rounds for fight night have the “Confusion” mod for this week.Party leader deletes 2 spin options and 2 weekday “FUN” events (can not be PvP). No PvP game will be picked this week.
description: CONSTITUTION

reward: Party leader gets to pick any available PVP game for the week. Party also gains 50 ducats
punishment: {DECEPTION} All bets only pay half of the winnings this week. Party leader deletes 2 spin options and 2 weekday “FUN” events (can not be PvP). No PvP game will be picked this week.
description: INTELLINGENCE

reward: Party leader gets to pick any available PVP game for the week. Party also gains 50 ducats
punishment: {CLAIRVOYANCE} Block and positive weekly mods gained next week. Party leader deletes 2 spin options and 2 weekday “FUN” events (can not be PvP). No PvP game will be picked this week
description: PERCEPTION

Welcome to one of the most vibrant, diverse, exciting and competitive but unifying sports in the world - street basketball. Pick your player from a pool of custom-designed, one-of-a-kind characters based on real-life street basketball players, team up with your friends online or in-person, and hit the court to play authentic, fast-paced 3 on 3 street basketball real-time matches against live opponents in settings inspired by the world’s most-revered street basketball venues. Once the ball is tipped, you can take on opponents with the signature, jaw-dropping basketball tricks each character possesses, link up with your teammates for soaring alley-oops and no-look passes, and create your own style which turns you into a street basketball legend.

Select your favorite adorably murderous fox, panda, or sloth and parachute into a furocious 64-player battle arena. Explore a top-down 2D world, full of exotic biomes, psychotic animals, hamster balls, emus and much more. Wield pistols, snipers, miniguns, explosives, and silly dances on your way to the top of the food chain

Master an ever-growing roster of diverse Legends, deep tactical squad play and bold new innovations that go beyond the Battle Royale experience—all within a rugged world where anything goes. Welcome to the next evolution of Hero Shooter

Dive into the world of Destiny 2 to explore the mysteries of the solar system and experience responsive first-person shooter combat. Unlock powerful elemental abilities and collect unique gear to customize your Guardian's look and playstyle. Enjoy Destiny 2’s cinematic story, challenging co-op missions, and a variety of PvP modes alone or with friends. Download for free today and write your legend in the stars.

details: PvP mode, no longer on gamepass
description: Welcome to the Escape Academy. Train to become the ultimate Escapist. Solve Puzzles. Hack Servers. Meet the Faculty. Brew the perfect cup of tea. Escape Rooms in single player or co-op with a friend - local or online!

Fall Guys is a massively multiplayer party game with up to 60 players online in a free-for-all struggle through round after round of escalating chaos until one victor remains! Fall Guys throws hordes of contestants together online in a mad dash through round after round of escalating chaos until one victor remains.

details: Online mode, 1- 6min qtrs. game Hard difficulty
description: EA SPORTS FC 24 brings you the biggest stage in football; authentic teams, real players and leagues, all powered by the most authentic football gameplay ever, thanks to the revolutionary HyperMotion technology.

Fortnite is a world of many experiences. Drop onto the Island and compete to be the last player — or team — standing in Battle Royale. Create your own games and experiences with Fortnite Creative. Or team up with others to save the world in Fortnite Save the World.

Fuzion Frenzy is a launch title for the Microsoft Xbox. At its core, Fuzion Frenzy is a four-player party game featuring 45 different mini-games (not including the titular Fuzion Frenzy). A demo of the game was included with some other launch titles in the US, including Halo, Munch's Oddysee, the first Project Gotham Racing game and Amped. The title was among the first to be released as a part of the Xbox Originals program.

Marvel Rivals is an hero shooter video game developed and published by NetEase Games in collaboration with Marvel Games. The game is free-to-play with a current line up of 33 characters from Marvel Comics

From one of gaming's most acclaimed sagas, Gears 5's celebrated campaign and multiplayer have been fully optimized for Xbox Series X/S. With all-new content and features, players can enjoy stunning visuals and intense gameplay.

HAWKED is a PvPvE extraction shooter where you compete with rival players and battle AI enemies while racing to collect precious artifacts. Team up with other Renegades and complete contracts to unlock powerful treasures and get rich in the process!

details: Quick play mode, no longer on gamepass

description: Hunt: Showdown is a competitive first-person PvP bounty hunting game with heavy PvE elements. Set in the darkest corners of the world, it packs the thrill of survival games into match-based format.

NARAKA: BLADEPOINT is a up to 60-player PVP mythical action combat experience with martial arts inspired melee combat, gravity defying mobility, vast arsenals of melee & ranged weapons, legendary customizable heroes with epic abilities.
NBA 2K24 is the latest iteration of the world-renowned basketball video game franchise. Experience realistic gameplay, manage your team in MyCAREER, and compete online in various game modes.

Overwatch 2 is a free-to-play, team-based action game set in the optimistic future. Every match is the ultimate 5v5 battlefield brawl. Play as a time-jumping freedom fighter, a beat-dropping battlefield DJ, or one of over 30 other unique heroes as you battle it out around the globe.
Paladins is a free-to-play fantasy team-based first-person shooter. Players take on the role of a Champion in objective-based game modes including Siege, Team Deathmatch, and Ranked matches.
PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS is a battle royale shooter that pits 100 players against each other in a struggle for survival. Gather supplies and outwit your opponents to become the last person standing.

Rocket League is a high-powered hybrid of arcade-style soccer and vehicular mayhem with easy-to-understand controls and fluid, physics-driven competition. Hit the field by yourself or with friends in 1v1, 2v2, and 3v3 matches.
Rogue Company is a free-to-play multiplayer tactical third-person hero shooter. Choose your Rogue, master their abilities, and dominate your opponents in objective-based game modes.
SMITE is the multiplayer online battle arena that puts players in control of mythological gods from a third-person perspective. Join over 35 million players in the ultimate Battleground of the Gods!

Sonic and the All-Stars cast line up on the starting grid once again to battle for supremacy in the ultimate race. Transform your vehicle to race across land, water and air in the most extreme courses ever seen!

Splitgate is a free-to-play, fast-paced multiplayer shooter that features player-controlled portals. This sci-fi shooter takes the FPS genre to a new dimension with its portal mechanics, delivering high-flying, multi-dimensional combat. Evoking memories of the most revered shooters of the past two decades, Splitgate embraces the classic and familiar feel of close-quarters combat while adding a unique twist.

scoring: The game ends after 3 rounds and you'll score for objectives and for each map hex where you have a tag AND lose points for cop cars and solo tags. The crew with the most points wins!
description: Welcome to Wildstyle, where the city is your canvas and the streets belong to the people. Rock to the beat of your favorite pirate radio station while you and your crew tag the city. Make sure your rivals know where their turf ends and where yours begins. Watch out for the man though, because not everyone in the city appreciates your artistic endeavors and they might call the fuzz on you!
